creator: Lee, Russell, 1903-1986
medium: 1 negative : safety ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 inches or smaller.
title: Daughter of fruit farmer. Placer County, California. Her father owns eighteen acres, twelve of which are in fruit. Has no garden, cows, pigs, etc. Have farmed this land for twenty-five years and now have heavy indebtedness to Federal Land Bank and expect to lose their farm momentarily. "Maybe the Okies will make a success where we have made a failure" they say as they see the Okies moving in
